text: Paul Giacobbi (born 4 June 1957 in Courbevoie, Hauts-de-Seine) was a member of the National Assembly of France until he retired at the 2017 Parliamentary Elections. He represented the 2nd constituency of the Haute-Corse department, and is a member of the Radical Party of the Left. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:People from Courbevoie Category:French people of Corsican descent Category:Radical Party of the Left politicians Category:French Ministers of Overseas France Category:Politicians from Île-de- France Category:Members of the Corsican Assembly Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Paul Giacobbi
